description.narrative:
Insatsen utgörs av upphandling med förnyad konkurrensutsättning från ramavtal "Democratic Governance and Human Rights" till ett totalt belopp om max 1 000 000 SEK. Upphandlad konsult skall enligt framtagen uppdragsbeskrivning stödja Ambassaden i Kosovo i arbetet med att analysera förutsättningar för kommande insatsstöd till KAS, vilket utgörs av 20 000 000 SEK i delegerade medel från EU i Kosovo samt 10 000 000 SEK av Sidas medel.
Policymarkör 1 har valts för område Jämtälldhet då jämställdhet har integrerats som ett centralt tema i ToR, dialogfråga med konsulter samt väntas vara integrerat i slutprodukt och kommande program.

The operation consists of procurement with renewed competition from the framework agreement "Democratic Governance and Human Rights" for a total amount of max. 1 000 000 SEK. The contracted consultant will support the Embassy in Kosovo, in accordance with the mandatory mission statement, in analyzing the conditions for future action support to the KAS, which amounts to SEK 20,000,000 in delegated EU funds in Kosovo and SEK 10,000,000 of Sida's funds. Policy marker 1 has been selected for area gender equality as gender has been included as a central are in the ToR for the assignment in the dialogue with consultants and as it is expected to be mainstreamed throughout the final product and hence in the upcoming program.

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The assignment consisted of a call of from Sida's Framework Agreement on Democracy and Governance. SKL International and PAi were the only contractors to bid on the assignment, but did so with a very high-quality tender and were thus selected for the assignment. The assignment was carried out through a mix of desk study, in-country visit with interviews and workshops combined with surveys. The Team Composition included all relevant expertise (including a Management and Organizational expert). The Team went to great lengths to include all stakeholders - and primarily Kosovo Agency of Statistics (KAS) in the assignment, particularly in the last part which consisted of development of the document of action (/programme document for the upcoming programme. The consultants have delivered the inception and assessment report and the consecutive Document of Action, thereby fulfilling the demands of the assignment. It should be noted that the consultants went above and beyond their original assignment in attempting to deliver a document that could be approved by all and that there was therefore a costed extension of the contract (consulted and approved by JUR) and a slight delay in the delivery of the final product. The final version of the assessment report was delivered 2018-04-12 The Final Document of Action including budget and results framework was delivered 2018-06-21
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
